**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 242 1.1, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 107 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deities** [Kostchtchie](/Deities.aspx?ID=77), [Sithhud](/Deities.aspx?ID=438) **Patron Theme** [Baba Yaga](/Patrons.aspx?ID=27) **Area** 15-foot cone **Defense** Reflex --- A cone of icy shards bursts from your spread hands and coats the targets in a layer of frost. You deal 2d4 cold damage to creatures in the area; they must each attempt a Reflex save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage and takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds. --- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d4.
